module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.26* Reduce the number of hints/extensions generated for queues. *2.11.0.25* Add support for vqplus Callback Queues *2.11.0.24* Add variables to store which queue a call is joining. *2.11.0.23* #1953 *2.11.0.22* Restrict dialing of feature codes (partial revert of previous). *2.11.0.20* Update items *2.11.0.19* Add hints for callers in queues. *2.11.0.18* Forgot one label *2.11.0.17* Fix label ordering in a radioset *2.11.0.16* #7215 -- __construct missing. *2.11.0.15* #7202 MoH not being set properly *2.11.0.14* #6957 *2.11.0.13* Added ::create() call *2.11.0.12* #7011 *2.11.0.11* #6991 *2.11.0.10* #6836, #6881, #6927 *2.11.0.9* #6744 *2.11.0.8* #6703 *2.11.0.7* Added better granularity and range to some Queue time options *2.11.0.6* Fixes #6446, queue recording *2.11.0.5* mis-formed html *2.11.0.4* #6333, adds advanced settings for default starting Queue Event values. *2.11.0.3* add gotodest splicing label *2.11.0.2* remove some dialplan warnings *2.11.0.1* #4767, #6084, #5895, #6092 *2.11.0.0* #6051
